subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Pitino, a former assistant to Syracuse Coach Jim Boeheim and now Louisville’s coach, chided the N.C.A.A. for its multiyear investigation into Boeheim’s program.
snippet: Pitino, a former assistant to Syracuse Coach Jim Boeheim and now Louisville’s coach, chided the N.C.A.A. for its multiyear investigation into Boeheim’s program.
